title:
Zhixue Luo
骆志学
text:
Biography
I am now a data modeler at DESHENGTANG GROUP CO., LTD.
Previously, I obtained my Bachelor’s degree from School of Science, Bejing University of Posts and Telecommunications (BUPT). I am interested in Data Sceience and Machine learning. Besides, recently in my spare time I began to learn some about Operational Research.


Interests

Data Science
Machine Learning



Education
Bejing University of Posts and Telecommunications | Beijing
B.Sc. in Mathematics and Applied Mathematics | Sept 2018 - June 2022


Experience
DESHENGTANG GROUP CO., LTD | Data Modeler | May 2023 - present


Publications

Luo, Z., Zhang, L., Liu, N., Wu, Y., 2023. Time series clustering of COVID-19 pandemic-related data. Data Science and Management 6, 79–87. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.dsm.2023.03.003
